class="questionAnswerPage_question-answer-page__header__g_02w">Contact CARFAX Consumer Help</h1><div><div>CARFAX offers a convenient way for consumers to request assistance through submitting a request online. The online help request allows consumers to submit all of their questions and concerns in one communication, and in turn, enables CARFAX to provide you with all of the information you may need in a timely manner. <b>Because our staff are dedicated to providing quality support through email, we do not offer phone support.</b><br><br>Here's more information on how to get the help that you need:</div>

<div> </div>

<div><u><strong>Report a discrepancy</strong></u></div>

<div>If you believe there is a discrepancy on your CARFAX Report, please complete the online Data Research Request form to make sure we have all the information we need to research the matter. </div>

<div> </div>

<div><a href="/contact-us/datarequest/true">Data Research Request Form</a></div>

<div> </div>

<div> </div>

<div><u><strong>Any other Customer Service needs</strong></u></div>

<div>Any questions about your account, including help logging in, purchasing Reports, or any other general questions or customer service needs:</div>

<div> </div>

<div><strong>Email:</strong> Please complete this Contact Us form to make sure we have all the information we need to assist you.  </div>

<div> </div>

<div><a href="/contact-us/general">Contact Us Form</a></div>

<div> </div>

<div> </div>

<div> </div>

<div><u><strong>Business Inquiries</strong></u></div>

<div>If you are a business, please see our business inquiries section below to make sure your request is handled by the right department.</div>

<div> </div>

<div><a href="/article/carfax-reports-for-a-dealership-or-other-business">CARFAX Reports for Businesses</a></div></div><section class="contactUsWidget_widget__oR03s"><h2 class="contactUsWidget_header__TpGmd">Contact Us</h2><div class="contactUsWidget_boxes__JnljL"><div class="contactUsWidget_box__G9sfr"><a href="/contact-us/datarequest/true/" data-theme="blue-flat" data-compact="true" class="button button-link contactUsWidget_link__BI7XP">Think a report has an error?</a><p class="contactUsWidget_text__mtOA_">Let us know the details and we’ll look into it and get back to you</p><a href="/contact-us/datarequest/true/" data-theme="blue-outline" class="button button-link contactUsWidget_button__1BGn6">Report a Concern</a></div><div class="contactUsWidget_divider__AI6iQ" role="presentation"></div><div class="contactUsWidget_box__G9sfr"><a href="/contact-us/general/" data-theme="blue-flat" data-compact="true" class="button button-link contactUsWidget_link__BI7XP">Have a general question?</a><p class="contactUsWidget_text__mtOA_">Send us a message and read our response at your convenience</p><a href="/contact-us/general/" data-theme="blue-outline" class="button button-link contactUsWidget_button__1BGn6">Contact Us</a></div></div><p class="contactUsWidget_note__UykWk">Note: We don’t offer phone support out of full dedication to our other help channels. You can change the global language setting here.

See a list of car dealers where you can buy cleaner vehicles under the Clean Cars for All program.

Program Advisory: Between January 1, 2023 and December 31, 2027, qualifying Clean Cars for All (CCFA) replacement vehicles are subject to a partial sales and use tax rate exemption of 3.9375% at authorized CCFA dealerships. Read the Program Advisory(295 Kb PDF, 4 pgs) to learn more.

Clean Cars for All Participants must purchase their vehicle from an authorized dealership on this list. To improve your experience at a dealership, each dealership has at least one dealership contact trained on how to process Clean Cars for All grants. All Participants must work with designated dealership contacts or their team.

Dealerships interested in becoming an Authorized Dealership may submit a Request for Qualifications, under Section 2022-008.

const toTitleCase = (s) => {
if (!s) { return ''; }
return s.replace(/\w\S*/g, (v) => { return v.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + v.substr(1).toLowerCase(); });
};
window.DDC = window.DDC || {};
if (sessionStorage.getItem('session.location') !== null) {

const [ userCity, userState, userCountry ] = postalCityState ? decodeURIComponent(postalCityState).split(', ') : [];
const [ userLatitude, userLongitude ] = userCoordinates ? decodeURIComponent(userCoordinates).split(',') : [];
window.DDC.userLocation = {
userPostalCode,
userLatitude,
userLongitude,
userCity: userCity ? toTitleCase(userCity) : '',
userState,
userCountry
};
// Cache userLocation Data
sessionStorage.setItem('session.location', JSON.stringify(window.DDC.userLocation));
}

camelCase;

}
};

<div id="kbb-reviews1-app-root" class="ddc-content ws-kbb-reviews" data-widget-name="ws-kbb-reviews" data-widget-id="kbb-reviews1" data-reactroot=""><h3 class="widget-heading h2">KBB.com Consumer Reviews</h3><div><div class="kbb-header d-flex align-items-center"><div class="kbb-logo-container"><img src="https://static.dealer.com/global/media/logos/kbb/horizontal/light/180x102.png" alt="Kelley Blue Book - KBB.com" width="180" height="102"></div><div class="kbb-ratings ml-auto"><div class="bg-contrast-med border ddc-font-size-small text-center py-1 px-3"><span class="text-muted">Overall</span><strong class="ddc-font-size-xxlarge d-block font-weight-bold">4.4</strong><span class="text-muted">Out of <!-- -->5</span></div></div></div><div class="kbb-reviews mt-3"><ul class="list-unstyled"><li class="border-bottom py-4"><div class="kbb-review-item d-flex"><div class="kbb-review-heading-container"><h4 class="kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0">The suv so far for the money</h4><p class="text-muted"><span><span class="kbb-review-name">By <!-- -->simon</span><span class="text-muted separator" aria-hidden="true"> | </span><span class="sr-only"> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class="kbb-review-submission-date">Tuesday, December 01, 2020</span></p></div><strong class="kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge">5.0</strong></div><div class="review-body"><span><span></span><span>So, before I tried this suv, I thought bmw cars are too firm to drive, terrible road feel, but great control. However, after my first 1 min test drive, I was sold immediately. The best designed suv for the money. The ride is not firm at all, so refined tuning such that it is very comfortable, but with great handling ability. Power is also very bmw, the the interior design is classic but with technology. Unlike other cars that prefer touch screens all over the place, this x3 knows the boundaries. All I can say about this car is: German technology, german quality. Absolute a joy to drive everyday.</span><span style="position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0"><span>…<!-- --> <button class="read-more-link text-link d-block" type="button">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class="border-bottom py-4"><div class="kbb-review-item d-flex"><div class="kbb-review-heading-container"><h4 class="kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0">Perfect Luxury Car</h4><p class="text-muted"><span><span class="kbb-review-name">By <!-- -->Nat</span><span class="text-muted separator" aria-hidden="true"> | </span><span class="sr-only"> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class="kbb-review-submission-date">Friday, July 24, 2020</span></p></div><strong class="kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge">5.0</strong></div><div class="review-body"><span><span></span><span>I absolutely love my car. It is quiet, handles extremely well, and is so gratifying to drive. I was recently driving on an interstate where semis do not look for other drivers. The semi almost drove into a car who swerved into the lane I was about to merge in, I had to slam my breaks and the car reacted immediately, avoiding a collision. The blind spot assist is wonderful and makes me feel more safe. The rear view camera is crisp and clear and provides accurate guides. The vehicle also detects your surroundings and warns you when you are too close to curbs when parking. The break hold option is very necessary and helpful in the suburbs. I LOVE the panoramic sunroof, it feels so open. The driver seats has great adjustments, I have the lumber support, and it works wonders for my body. I usually don't like driving but I love driving this car. 
I test drove other cars, including Mercedes, and the layout of the BMW is so much better inside and drives even better. I also drove a brand new Volskwagen Tiguan and it does not compare to the drive of the BMW. I also test drove a 2020 BMW x1 and 2021 x2, and the 2019 BMW x3 is so well equipped and sleeker than these.</span><span style="position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0"><span>…<!-- --> <button class="read-more-link text-link d-block" type="button">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class="border-bottom py-4"><div class="kbb-review-item d-flex"><div class="kbb-review-heading-container"><h4 class="kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0">All Around Excellent Vehicle</h4><p class="text-muted"><span><span class="kbb-review-name">By <!-- -->Very Satisfied in Alaska</span><span class="text-muted separator" aria-hidden="true"> | </span><span class="sr-only"> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class="kbb-review-submission-date">Saturday, June 05, 2021</span></p></div><strong class="kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge">5.0</strong></div><div class="review-body"><span><span></span><span>I am a long-term sedan driver, but changed over to the X3 because of its performance-oriented driving characteristics, build/interior quality, and its incredible practicality. Everything about the vehicle simply works for me. Several points to highlight for potential buyers:
1. The 2.0L 4-cylinder engine is superb. This is my third BMW with this motor. It is powerful, immediately responsive and very efficient. I am averaging 27.5 MPG in mixed driving. In sport mode it moves out.
2. Handing is excellent for this type vehicle. Not surprisingly, with its higher center-gravity it's not a 2 or 3-series in the corners, but steering response is quick and vehicle remains flat and firmly planted in turns. I drove it through several months of Alaska winter this year on OEM wheels/tires without a problem.
3. The ride is very comfortable, composed and generally quiet. It's not a plush car, but it's not intended to be that way. Interior quality is excellent and I like the clean, purposeful functionality of the dash layout.
I recommend buyers looking for a fun, practical and well-made vehicle give the X3 a serious look.</span><span style="position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0"><span>…<!-- --> <button class="read-more-link text-link d-block" type="button">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li></ul></div><div class="kbb-footer mt-3"><span><span class="kbb-footer-text text-muted">Based on <!-- -->55<!-- --> consumer ratings for<!-- --> <!-- -->2018–2024<!-- --> models.</span><span class="text-muted separator " aria-hidden="true"> | </span></span><a class="kbb-privacy-link" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://www.kbb.com/company/privacy-policy/">Privacy<!-- --> </a></div></div></div>

<script>

DDC.WidgetData["tracking-ddc"].showPrivacyBanner = true || false;
DDC.WidgetData["tracking-ddc"].inlinePrivacyBanner = true
const addPrivacyBannerInline = () => {
const privacyBanner = document.querySelector('.consumer-privacy-banner');
if (!privacyBanner) return; // early return if the banner is not found
const PRIVACY_STATUS = "DDC.AllowUserData";
const allowUserData = window.localStorage.getItem(PRIVACY_STATUS);
const hideForKeyboard = () => {
// Get focusable elements inside the banner
// This might be kind of ridiculous solutuon, and maybe we could get away with another solution like simply checking if the element has a `tabindex` attribute?
// The problem is that :tabbable isn't available as a vanilla JS selector.
const tabbableElements = privacyBanner.querySelectorAll(
'a[href], audio[controls], video[controls], button, details, iframe, input:not([disabled]), select:not([disabled]), summary, textarea:not([disabled]), [tabindex="0"], [contenteditable="true"], [accesskey]'
);
tabbableElements.forEach(el => el.setAttribute('tabindex', '-1'));
};
if (allowUserData !== 'true') {
const privacyBannerCloseButton = privacyBanner.querySelector('.consumer-privacy-banner-button');
if (!privacyBannerCloseButton) return;
document.body.prepend(privacyBanner);
privacyBannerCloseButton.addEventListener('click', e => {
e.preventDefault();
privacyBanner.classList.remove('in');
privacyBanner.classList.remove('no-animation');
privacyBanner.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');
hideForKeyboard();
window.localStorage.setItem(PRIVACY_STATUS, 'true');
});
}
}
if(
(true || false)
&& 
true
) {
addPrivacyBannerInline()
}

setCallTrackingSessionCookie = function(uuid) {
// Set cookie to expire in 2 hours
var expirationTime = new Date();
expirationTime.setTime(expirationTime.getTime() + 120 * 60 * 1000);
document.cookie = 'callTrackingSessionId=' + uuid + ';expires=' + expirationTime.toGMTString() + ';path=/';
},
cookieRxResults = new RegExp("callTrackingSessionId=\(\.\*\?\)\(;\|\$\)").exec(document.cookie),
callTrackingSessionId
;
if (cookieRxResults) {
callTrackingSessionId = cookieRxResults[1];
} else {
callTrackingSessionId = generateCallTrackingSessionId();
setCallTrackingSessionCookie(callTrackingSessionId);
}

The blind spot assist is wonderful and makes me feel more safe. The rear view camera is crisp and clear and provides accurate guides. Everything about the vehicle simply works for me. Several points to highlight for potential buyers:\n1. The 2.0L 4-cylinder engine is superb. This is my third BMW with this motor.
